resources.string:
"PantherQuiz Students Manual


Authentication


Email/Password Authentication


You can register with your email to access quizzes of your class.

Make sure your teacher adds you to the class with this same email address


Google SignIn

You can login with your Google Account to access quizzes as long as your teacher adds you to the class with this same google account.


Sample flow for taking a quiz


SignIn to your account 

Click on the HOME button.

In the My Classes View select the name of your class.

In the Quizzes List select the quiz you want to take.

You will see the quiz detail, check with the details and if it is available.

Enter a pass code if it is applicable and click on the START QUIZ button.

Now you see the questions for that quiz, read the questions and click on the correct answers for each questions.

You can hit the SAVE button any time during the period of the quiz.

When you are done with answering the questions hit SUBMIT and confirm the submission.

Now you submitted your first quiz.

Aftter submission the Submitted Quizzse screen displays.

See the score and click on the DETAIL button to see the detail result of that quiz.

You can hit the back button or My Quiz List button to go back to the list of submitted quizzes.

Or you can use the overflow menu on the top right corner to navigate to the any screen.


Class Room

 Why I am not seeing my class name under the Classes List?

You will see your class name only if the teacher added you in that class with the same email address you are logged in to.


Why I am not seeing any quizzes under my Class?

It could be because of two reasons


There may not be any quizzes posted for this class yet.

The teacher may have locked the quizzes, you may need to check with your teacher.


Can I add myself to a class?


No, only your teacher that class can add you to the class.


How long will I have access to a class after?

As long as the teacher keeps that class open.

Quizzes


Quiz is available but it says wrong passcode when trying take the quiz?

You need to use a pass code(challenge) that is provided by your teacher.


Can I use the one pass code for all quizzes?

No, Every quiz may have different passcodes, check with your teacher.

It is up to the teacher to use a passcode or not for each quizzes.


Can I resubmit a quiz?

No, you can not resubmit a quiz. You may save the quiz and submit latter.


What are Submitted Quizzes and MyQuizzes List?

Submitted Quizzes are only list of scored quizzes.

Quizzes or MyQuizzes List is list of all available quizzes of that class including submitted quizzes.


Why the START QUIZ button is disabled?

Either the start date is in the future or 

The End date is already passed or 

The Quiz is locked by the teacher.




 "
